Package chess.model.moves

Class Movable

java.lang.Object
chess.model.Colored
chess.model.moves.Movable
All Implemented Interfaces:
chess.persistence.Codable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Movement, PlayerMove
public abstract class Movable extends Colored
An abstract, generic, and overarching representation of a Chess movement, defined by:
  1. The initial position of the piece.
  2. The final position of the piece.
  3. The initiator (White or Black) of the movement.
Upon initializing any subclass instances of the class, the instance keeps its own copy of Position objects in an effort to preserve a non-referential description of the movement.

  • Method Details

    • encode

      public org.json.JSONObject encode()
      Serializes this Movable to a JSON object of the following format: 
       {
     "color":"<color>",
     "initialPosition":"<position>",
     "finalPosition":"<position>"
 }
      where:
      • <position>: the string representation of the Position object, matching the pattern ^[a-hA-H][1-8]$.
      Specified by:
      encode in interface chess.persistence.Codable
      Overrides:
      encode in class Colored
      Returns:
      A serialized object ready to be written.
      See Also:
      • Colored.encode()
      • Position.toString()

    • getInitialPosition

      public final Position getInitialPosition()
      Returns:
      The initial position of this movement.

    • getFinalPosition

      public final Position getFinalPosition()
      Returns:
      The final position of this movement.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      The default string representation of this Movable is of the form: 
       <from> →<to>
      where:
      • <from> is of the pattern: ♟@^[a-hA-H][1-8]$;
      • <to> is of the pattern: ^[a-hA-H][1-8]$.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation of this movement.
